edu.snu.onyx.runtime.master

Class BlockManagerMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.onyx.runtime.master.BlockManagerMaster

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class BlockManagerMaster
extends Object
    Master-side block manager.

      class  BlockManagerMaster.PartitionManagerMasterControlMessageReceiver
      Handler for control messages received.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeState

        public void initializeState(String blockId,
                            String producerTaskGroupId)
        Initializes the states of a block which will be produced by producer task(s).
        Parameters:
        blockId - the id of the block to initialize.
        producerTaskGroupId - the id of the producer task group.

      • removeWorker

        public Set<String> removeWorker(String executorId)
        Manages the block information when a executor is removed.
        Parameters:
        executorId - the id of removed executor.
        Returns:
        the set of task groups have to be recomputed.

      • getBlockLocationFuture

        public CompletableFuture<String> getBlockLocationFuture(String blockId)
        Returns a CompletableFuture of block location, which is not yet resolved in SCHEDULED state.
        Parameters:
        blockId - id of the specified block.
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture of block location, which completes exceptionally when the block is not SCHEDULED or COMMITTED.

      • getProducerTaskGroupIds

        public Set<String> getProducerTaskGroupIds(String blockId)
        Gets the ids of the task groups which already produced or will produce data for a specific block.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the id of the block.
        Returns:
        the ids of the producer task groups.

      • onProducerTaskGroupScheduled

        public void onProducerTaskGroupScheduled(String scheduledTaskGroupId)
        To be called when a potential producer task group is scheduled. To be precise, it is called when the task group is enqueued to PendingTaskGroupQueue.
        Parameters:
        scheduledTaskGroupId - the ID of the scheduled task group.

      • onProducerTaskGroupFailed

        public void onProducerTaskGroupFailed(String failedTaskGroupId)
        To be called when a potential producer task group fails. Only the TaskGroups that have not yet completed (i.e. blocks not yet committed) will call this method.
        Parameters:
        failedTaskGroupId - the ID of the task group that failed.

      • onBlockStateChanged

        public void onBlockStateChanged(String blockId,
                                BlockState.State newState,
                                @Nullable
                                String location)
        Deals with state change of a block.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the id of the block.
        newState - the new state of the block.
        location - the location of the block (e.g., worker id, remote store). null if not committed or lost.

      • onReservePartition

        public void onReservePartition(edu.snu.onyx.runtime.common.comm.ControlMessage.Message message,
                               MessageContext messageContext)
        Reserves the region for a partition in a block, appends the partition metadata, and replies with the starting point of the block in the file.
        Parameters:
        message - the message having the partition metadata to append.
        messageContext - the context which will be used for response.

      • onCommitPartitions

        public void onCommitPartitions(edu.snu.onyx.runtime.common.comm.ControlMessage.Message message)
        Commits the partitions for a remote block.
        Parameters:
        message - the message having metadata to commit.

      • onRequestPartitionMetadata

        public void onRequestPartitionMetadata(edu.snu.onyx.runtime.common.comm.ControlMessage.Message message,
                                       MessageContext messageContext)
        Accepts a request for the partition metadata and replies with the metadata for a remote block.
        Parameters:
        message - the message having metadata to store.
        messageContext - the context to reply.

      • onRemovePartitionMetadata

        public void onRemovePartitionMetadata(edu.snu.onyx.runtime.common.comm.ControlMessage.Message message)
        Removes the partition metadata for a remote block. If the target block was not previously created, ignores this message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message pointing the metadata to remove.

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
